#summary Release notes

Release Notes for My Tracks version 1.1.14
  * add a search menu option to search for tracks and markers by name, category, or description
  * format date and time using the phone's format
  * add ISO 8601 date format as an option for the default track name in Settings->Recording->Track name
  * add ANT+ cadence profile
  * allow international characters in the file name when saving a track to the SD card
  * improve the code for sending a track to Google Maps, Google Fusion Tables, and Google Docs
